title: With the new Client almost out of beta...
body: I have realized that this is the second and probably the only other beta Riot will ever complete...  Rip Boards.

replies.body:
Remind me, please...the old forums was declared obsolete and defunct, and then the Boards Beta took over - and still is in Beta, aren't they?
_And as far as I know, they won't ever get completed._

Maybe that's the joke here. But when it comes to how they do things, I just can't see the humour anymore, as it's long been the default.
The joke is how amazing it is they're gonna complete a beta stage.
I don't believe that until I see it! ^^

third beta.

Twisted treeline was a beta for about a year as well.
And everyone complained about the new map xD, they still kept it. This bit to player feedback.
Meanwhile, people liked the dominion map, and had fun in it with custom game modes, guess which one of them got taken away?

And I'm just sitting here, waiting for the tribunal to come back.
https://cdn.meme.am/cache/images/folder571/600x600/12086571/skeleton-at-desk.jpg
How about let's not take the legacy client out entirely and continue to let people chose what they want to use.
Then they'd have to update both clients whenever there's an update, which is a huge waste of time.
